content: --- title: Air Traffic Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:21:28.988Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:38:50.305Z --- # Air Traffic Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | regId | `'string'` | Registration id of assigned aircraft | | callSign | `'string'` | Call sign of the aircraft for that flight | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier name | | type | `'string'` | Aircraft flight duty type: inbound or outbound | | latitude | `'string'` | Latitude of the position | | longitude | `'string'` | Longtitude of the position | | direction | `'string'` | Direction of the aircraft | | groundSpeed | `'string'` | Speed relative to ground | | trueAirSpeed | `'string'` | Speed | | indicatedAirSpeed | `'string'` | Speed that is not corrected | | verticalSpeed | `'string'` | Vertical Speed | | calibratedAltitude | `'string'` | Corrected pressure altitude above mean sea level | | gpsAltitude | `'string'` | Altitude based on GPS | | wind | `'string'` | Wind info provided by aircraft | | temperature | `'string'` | Temperature info provided by aircraft | | time | `'datetime'` | Date and time of the position info in UTC | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
fm:title: Air Traffic Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:21:28.988Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:38:50.305Z
